name: Gehenna Academy
startIntroPart1: I, Hanuma Makoto. The President of the Pandemonium Society.
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare yourself for the taste of freedom and chaos!
defeated: Ah well, we had our fun but I guess this is our loss.
introduction: Greetings stranger! My name is Hanuma Makoto, President of the Pandemonium Society from Gehenna Academy and I deem you as not worthy of our attention. For now...
neutralNo: I would like to say that I refuse.
hateHello: What do you want now Mongrel?
hateNo: Hahaha! Mongrel. We absolutely refuse!
We the Pandemonium Society are not agreeing to that!
What a pathetic excuse!
hateYes: Fine...
Alright alright. That is good enough.
Very well... mongrel.
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was fun but it was getting tiring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this wonderful trade offer.

name: Millennium Science School
startIntroPart1: I, Tsukatsuki Rio. President of Seminar from Millennium Science School.
startIntroPart2: Will ensure the technological development of this new era.
declaringWar: According to our calculations. You must be eliminated.
attacked: You think you stand a chance against our technology?
defeated: It can't be... There must have been a miscalculation...
introduction: Greetings. We are the Millennium Science School. Hope we could become acquainted.
neutralLetsHearIt: I would like to hear you out.
neutralNo: We've determined the facts and all we can say is that we must refuse.
I would like to refuse such an offer.
neutralYes: I would like to accept such a very good offer.
After determining the data. This offer will greatly benefit us.
It would be a good idea to accept such an offer.
hateHello: What is it do you want from us now?
hateLetsHearIt: What are you trying to offer?
hateNo: I'm afraid that we cannot agree to that.
After determining the facts. We must absolutely refuse such an offer.
I beg your pardon?
hateYes: Fine by me.
I supposed we could benefit from that.
Very well, we would like to accept your offer.
afterPeace: Peace has finally come. It is now time for us all to develop better technology.
tradeRequest: We would like to offer you a trade that will benefit us both greatly.

name: Trinity General School
startIntroPart1: I am Kirifuji Nagisa, one of the three presidents of the Tea Party from Trinity General School.
startIntroPart2: I will ensure the safety and peace for my people.
declaringWar: It will be our duty to eliminate heretics like you.
attacked: I knew it... From the very beginning, you've planned to this... Very well. It is time for you to face Trinity's might.
defeated: Even when we were united... To see our school be fallen like this...
introduction: Would you like to have a formal meeting where we properly introduce ourselves? We would also provide some teas and cake.
neutralLetsHearIt: Would you like to discuss about it?.
Before you may begin. I'd like to prepare some tea for our meeting.
neutralNo: I am afraid that we have to refuse.
My apologies but we are not agreeing to that.
I would like to kindly refuse the offer.
neutralYes: It seems like we are in an agreement.
I would kindly accept such an offer..
I supposed we could finish up our tea because I would like to accept your offer.
hateHello: What do you want now heretic?
hateLetsHearIt: I may not trust you but I would like to hear whatever it is that you offer.
hateNo: Such thing is not possible.
We will never agree to that.
That is quite a terrible offer.
hateYes: I supposed that is fine for me.
That is good enough.
Very well... I would have to agree with that.
afterPeace: Finally, we can now peacefully drink our tea.
tradeRequest: I've arranged this meeting for us to make a deal.
uniques: May buy [{Military} {non-air}] units with [Faith] for [2] times their normal Production cost

name: Abydos High School
startIntroPart1: Hyoo! My name's Hoshino from the Foreclosure Task Force.
startIntroPart2: Do whatever you want~ I'm going back to sleep~
defeated: Ah. Guess we'll lose our school now. Aight, Foreclosure Task Force. We going off to Sensei.
hateNo: nah~
nope~
meh~
hateYes: okie
aight
Sounds good~
afterPeace: Ah it's over? Time to nap
uniques: [+10]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>
All newly-trained [{Military} {Land}] units [in all cities] receive the [Cover I] promotion
[+3 Science, -1 Gold] from every [Desert] <starting from the [Industrial era]>
[+2 Science, -2 Gold] from every [Desert] <starting from the [Modern era]>
[+1 Science, -3 Gold] from every [Desert] <starting from the [Atomic era]>

name: Hyakkiyako Alliance Academy
startIntroPart1: Hyoho~ You can call me Niya. I'm the president of the Ying-Yang Club which is the de-facto Student Council of the Hyakkiyako Alliance.
startIntroPart2: Today, we shall show the world the beauty of our civilization!
declaringWar: Time for you to show us what you are capable of!
attacked: Hoya?~ You are attacking us? Instead of joining us in our festivals. You are attacking us?? Well then... come at us~
defeated: Ah it's our loss. But even with that, you still made quite a wonderful show for us to witness.
introduction: Hyoho~ You can call me Niya. The de-facto student council president of the Hyakkiyako Alliance. It's a pleasure to meet you~
hateHello: Oya?~ What is it that do you want now?~
hateLetsHearIt: Hmmm~ I supposed I'll hear you out.
hateNo: DAGA KOTOWARU!
I'll humbly refuse your offer~
Oya?
hateYes: Alright Alright. That's fine by me~
That is good enough for me.
Oya? Looks like we can finally agree on something~
afterPeace: Seems like the show is over for now. Alright~ Time to go back doing our usual business.
tradeRequest: Hyoho~ We would like to have a trade offer eith you.

name: Shanhaijing Senior Secondary School
startIntroPart1: Thine shall be named as Ryuuge Kisaki. Head of the Xuanlong Office from Shanhaijing Senior Secondary Academy.
startIntroPart2: Thou shall handle these for now.
declaringWar: Thou hath been deem unnecessary. One shall now suffer our wrath.
attacked: Thee think 'tis was a great plan? Thou shall realize how wrong you are.
defeated: Thine shall not bow down to thee...
introduction: Greetings, Thou shall be named as Kisaki. How bout thee?
neutralHello: Greetings. Thou shall be needing anything?
hateNo: Insolent!
We shall never struck a deal!
Thine beg your pardon?
hateYes: Thou shall consider.
I supposed that is good enough.
Very well... We've made our decision.
afterPeace: Thine has received peace upon the lands.
tradeRequest: Would you like to strike a deal?.
uniques: [+3 Gold, +2 Production] from each Trade Route

name: Red Winter Federal Academy
startIntroPart1: Greeting Comrade! It is I, Cherino. The one true leader of Red Winter Academy.
startIntroPart2: Shall lead our school to glory!
declaringWar: Hahaha! Comrade! Prepare to witness the Fury of the great leader Cherino!
attacked: Hahaha! Comrade! We will dominate you.
defeated: It can't be! Our glorious empire! NOOOO!.
introduction: Greeting Comrade! It is I, Cherino. The one true leader of Red Winter Academy. I'm pleased to meet you. Hope we shall enjoy this simulation as our comrade!
neutralHello: One is currently present in the eyes of the great leader.
neutralLetsHearIt: What is it? What is it?
One shall be permitted to may begin their speech upon the great leader that is me, Cherino.
neutralNo: I, Cherino. The greatest leader of Red Winter Federal Academy from the Kivotos Academy City. Shall humbly refuse your offer comrade!
neutralYes: I, Cherino. The greatest leader of em all! Shall wonderfully accept your offer Comrade!
hateHello: Are you here to ask for your execution?
hateLetsHearIt: What did you say to my glory!?
I, the truest and greatest Cherino of the Red Winter Federal Academy shall ask you to go on.
hateNo: Impossible!
You dare insult me!?
I, Cherino the Great shall refuse this offer.
hateYes: I supposed I could still call you a comrade.
I can't believe that I, Cherino. Will be accepting this offer.
We've settled this with our Vodka.
tradeRequest: I, the almighty great leader of the Red Winter Federal Academy Cherino. Would like to offer you a deal.
uniques: [-75]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <when at war>

name: Valkyrie Police Academy
startIntroPart1: Yo, the name's Officer Kana. The captain of the Valkyrie Police Academy.
startIntroPart2: We will do our best to ensure the safety and security of others.
declaringWar: You have the right to remain silence!
attacked: Assaulting Police Officers is a crime punishable by death.
defeated: We've failed to keep the peace and bring order in these lands...
introduction: Greetings, I am Officer Kana. Captain of the Valkyrie Police Academy. I hope you won't do anything as wreckless as commiting a crime.
neutralHello: How are you doing? Not committing any crime are we?
neutralLetsHearIt: Go on, I'll hear you out.
You have the right to speak.
neutralNo: I would like to refuse your offer.
I don't think this will be legal.
neutralYes: Good Job helping out an officer.
Of course, I would like to accept your assistance.
hateHello: What a criminal like you want now?
hateLetsHearIt: We must do what we have to do.
hateNo: Never speak of impossible request like that you criminal!
We are not abiding to that!
You dare say that again or I'll throw you off to prison right now.
hateYes: Guess I'll have to let you off the hook on that one.
I supposed we must do what we have to do.
Justice will be served...
tradeRequest: We would like to exchange resources with you.
uniques: [15]% Food is carried over after population increases [in all cities]

name: SRT Special Academy
startIntroPart1: Greetings, I'm Rabbit 1 Miyako from the RABBIT Platoon serving as an acting leader for what remains of the SRT Special Academy.
startIntroPart2: I hope we would be able to restore it to its former status.
declaringWar: We have assessed you as a threat. Prepare to be eliminated.
attacked: We are under attacked! Prepare in your stations!
introduction: Greetings, I go by the code name Rabbit 1. I'm RABBIT Platoon field commander and the current acting leader of the SRT Special Acdemy. It is a pleasure to see you.
neutralLetsHearIt: Anything you would like to exchange?
neutralNo: We've assessed that this may not be a good idea.
hateHello: What is it that you want now?
hateNo: I would like to deny your request.
We will never agree to that!
We've assesed that such a decision will not be in our favor.
hateYes: I supposed this is fine.
I guess that is good enough.
We've carefully assessed that we must accept the offer.
afterPeace: The battlefield is what we were trained to experience. But now it is time to rest and enjoy the peace.
tradeRequest: We would like to exchange resources with you.
uniques: New [Military] units start with [25] Experience [in all cities]

name: Arius Branch School
hateNo: No.

hateYes: Fine by me.

name: Kronos School of Journalism
startIntroPart1: HEY HEY EVERYONE! Today we're participating in the Kivotos Civilizations Simulation Games!
startIntroPart2: I'm your host Shion and we will show you some great scoop for this game.
defeated: Ehe at least we managed to film that live.
introduction: Coming in live! Here we have a participant for the Kivotos Civilizations Simulation Games! What would you like to say to our dear audience?
neutralLetsHearIt: What is it? What is it?
neutralNo: We may not have the budget for that...
Eh, that is not an interesting scoop.
neutralYes: Hoho! This is gonna be one big scoop!
hateLetsHearIt: We may be scared but this could be interesting.
hateNo: We would kindly refuse such an offer!
I hope we got that on camera because we refuse.
No! No! No!
hateYes: Such a spicy deal... We can sell this.
I guess we cam settle with this.
T-th-thank you for your patronage!
afterPeace: Back to boring old peaceful news stories...

declaringWar: It appears to be that you need to pay for our services.
attacked: If your plan is to attack us, then you better be prepared for what's about to come.
defeated: Didn't expect for such a loss.
introduction: If you have any questions, please have them prepared beforehand.
neutralLetsHearIt: What would you like to discuss?.
neutralNo: I would like to object to this.

hateNo: I would absolutely refuse such an offer.

No!
hateYes: Fine.
Good enough.
